DAPAR2 0.6
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

addConnexComp()

Add the list of connex components to an assay in the object of classe Feeatures.

addListAdjacencyMatrices()

Function matrix of appartenance group

addOriginOfValues()

Sets the MEC tag in the OriginOfValues

aggIter()

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach.

aggIterParallel()

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach with use of parallelism.

aggMean()

Compute the intensity of proteins as the mean of the intensities of their peptides.

aggMetadata_parallel_sam()

This function aggregates features of metadata of peptides into a dataframe that is to be included in the rowdata of the new protein dataset.

aggMetadata_sam()

This function aggregates features of metadata of peptides into a dataframe that is to be included in the rowdata of the new protein dataset.

aggregateFeatures_sam()

Aggregate an assay's quantitative features which take into account the peptides shared between proteins

aggregate_with_matAdj()

Aggreagate quantitative features.

aggSum()

Compute the intensity of proteins with the sum of the intensities of their peptides.

aggTopn()

Compute the intensity of proteins as the sum of the intensities of their n best peptides.

barplotEnrichGO_HC()

A barplot that shows the result of a GO enrichment, using the package highcharter

barplotGroupGO_HC()

A barplot which shows the result of a GO classification, using the package highcharter

boxPlotD_HC()

Builds a boxplot from a dataframe using the library highcharter

buildGraph()

Build graph definition

BuildPalette()

Builds a complete color palette for the conditions given in argument

check.conditions()

Check if the design of conditions is valid

checkClusterability()

Prepare the data for subsequent clustering

CheckDesign()

Check the validity of the experimental design

classic1wayAnova()

Function to perform a One-way Anova statistical test on a QFeatures dataset

compareNormalizationD_HC()

Builds a plot from a numeric matrix.

compute.group.t.test()

xxxxxx

compute.t.test()

xxxxxx

ComputeConnexComposants()

Computes the connex components of a graph, represented by an adjacency matrix.

convertMSnset2QFeatures()

Creates an object of class QFeatures from an object of class MSnSet

corrMatrixD_HC()

Displays a correlation matrix of the quantitative data of a numeric matrix.

createQFeatures()

Creates an object of class QFeatures from text file

CVDistD_HC()

Distribution of CV of entities

dapar_hc_chart()

Customised resetZoomButton of highcharts plots

dapar_hc_ExportMenu()

Customised contextual menu of highcharts plots

densityPlotD_HC()

Builds a densityplot from a dataframe

diffAnaComputeFDR()

Computes the FDR corresponding to the p-values of the differential analysis using

diffAnalysis()

Returns a QFeatures object with the results of the differential analysis performed with 'limma package'.

diffAnaVolcanoplot_rCharts()

Volcanoplot of the differential analysis

diff_analysis_sam diff_analysis_sam(<SummarizedExperiment>) diff_analysis_sam(<QFeatures>)

Check the validity of the experimental design

display.CC.visNet()

Display a connex component.

enrich_GO()

Calculates GO enrichment classes for a given list of proteins/genes ID. It results an enrichResult instance.

filterFeaturesSam filterFeaturesSam(<SummarizedExperiment>) filterFeaturesSam(<QFeatures>)

Check the validity of the experimental design

find_MEC_matrix()

Finds the LAPALA into a MSnSet object

formatLimmaResult()

xxxx

formatPHResults()

Extract logFC and raw pvalues from multiple post-hoc models summaries

fudge2LRT()

Heuristic to choose the value of the hyperparameter (fudge factor) used to regularize the variance estimator in the likelihood ratio statistic

get.pep.prot.cc()

Build the list of connex composant of an adjacency matrix.

GetAdjMat()

Get an adjacency matrix from a QFeatures object

GetDetailedNbPeptides()

Computes the detailed number of peptides for each protein

GetDetailedNbPeptidesUsed()

Computes the detailed number of peptides used for aggregating each protein w.r.t NA values in peptide quantitative dataset. Even if a peptide is part of a protein, if its value is NA, it do not be used for aggreation.

getListNbValuesInLines()

Returns the possible number of values in lines in the data

GetNbPeptidesUsed()

Computes the number of peptides used for aggregating each protein

getQuantile4Imp()

Quantile imputation value definition

Get_AllComparisons()

Returns list that contains a list of the statistical tests performed with DAPAR2 and recorded in an object of class QFeatures.

GlobalQuantileAlignment()

Normalisation GlobalQuantileAlignement

GOAnalysisSave()

Returns an QFeatures object with the results of the GO analysis performed with the functions enrichGO and/or groupGO of the 'clusterProfiler' package.

GraphPepProt_hc()

Function to create a histogram that shows the repartition of peptides w.r.t. the proteins

groupttest()

xxxxxx

group_GO()

Calculates the GO profile of a vector of genes/proteins at a given level of the Gene Ontology

hc_logFC_DensityPlot()

Density plots of logFC values

hc_mvTypePlot2()

Distribution of Observed values with respect to intensity values

heatmap.DAPAR()

This function is inspired from the function 'heatmap.2' that displays a numeric matrix. For more information, please refer to the help of the heatmap.2 function.

heatmapD()

This function is a wrapper to 'heatmap.2' that displays a numeric matrix

histPValue_HC()

Plots a histogram of p-values

HypothesisTestMethods()

List of hypothesis tests methods

imputeMethodsDapar()

xxxx

impute_dapar impute_dapar(<SummarizedExperiment>) impute_dapar(<QFeatures>)

xxxxxx

impute_det_quant()

xxx

impute_fixed_value()

Missing values imputation from a MSnSet object

impute_knn_by_conditions()

KNN missing values imputation by conditions

impute_matrix_dapar()

xxx

impute_MEC_Methods()

List the methods in DAPAR to impute Missing Entire Condition (MEC)

impute_mi()

Missing values imputation using the LSimpute algorithm.

impute_mle_dapar()

Imputation of peptides having no values in a biological condition.

impute_pa()

Imputation of peptides having no values in a biological condition.

impute_pa2()

Missing values imputation from a MSnSet object

impute_POV_Methods()

List the methods available in DAPAR to impute Partially Observed Values (POV)

impute_slsa()

Imputation of peptides having no values in a biological condition.

inner.aggregate.iter()

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach.

inner.aggregate.topn()

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the top n approach.

inner.mean()

Aggregate peptides into proteins with the mean of the quantitative data per conditions.

inner.sum()

aggregate peptides into proteins with the sum of the quantitative data per conditions.

is.MV()

Similar to the function is.na but focused on the equality with the missing values in the dataset (type 'POV' and 'MEC')

is.OfType()

Similar to the function is.na but focused on the equality with the paramter 'type'.

LH0.lm()

xxxxxx

LH0()

xxxxxx

LH1.lm()

xxxxxx

LH1()

xxxxxx

limma.complete.test()

Computes a hierarchical differential analysis

listSheets()

This function returns the list of the sheets names in a Excel file.

LOESS()

Normalisation LOESS

make.contrast()

Builds the contrast matrix

make.design.1() make.design.1()

Builds the design matrix for designs of level 1

make.design.2()

Builds the design matrix for designs of level 2

make.design.3()

Builds the design matrix for designs of level 3

make.design()

Builds the design matrix

matAdjStats()

Computes the number of proteins that are only defined by specific peptides, shared peptides or a mixture of two.

MeanCentering()

Normalisation MeanCentering

mvHisto_HC()

Histogram of missing values

mvImage()

Heatmap of missing values

mvPerLinesHistoPerCondition_HC()

Bar plot of missing values per lines and per condition

mvPerLinesHisto_HC()

Bar plot of missing values per lines using highcharter

MVrowsTagToOne()

Filter lines in the matrix of intensities w.r.t. some criteria

MVrowsTagToOne_HB()

Filter missing values by proportion

nEmptyLines()

Returns the number of empty lines in the data

nonzero()

Retrieve the indices of non-zero elements in sparse matrices

normalizeD normalizeD(<SummarizedExperiment>) normalizeD(<QFeatures>)

Check the validity of the experimental design.

normalizeMethods.dapar()

List normalization methods

pepa.test()

PEptide based Protein differential Abundance test

plotJitterCC()

Jitter plot of CC

plotJitter_hc()

Display a a jitter plot for CC

plotPCA_Eigen_hc()

Plots the eigen values of PCA with the highcharts library

plotPCA_Ind()

Plots individuals of PCA

plotPCA_Var()

Plots variables of PCA

postHocTest()

Post-hoc tests for classic 1-way ANOVA

POV_impute_det_quant()

Imputation of the POV with the method of deterministic Quantile

POV_impute_knn_by_conditions()

KNN missing values imputation by conditions

POV_impute_slsa()

Imputation of peptides having no values in a biological condition.

proportionConRev_HC()

Barplot of proportion of contaminants and reverse

QuantileCentering()

Normalisation QuantileCentering

readExcel()

This function reads a sheet of an Excel file and put the data into a data.frame.

removeAdditionalCol()

standardiseMeanIntensities()

Check the validity of the experimental design

univ_AnnotDbPkg()

Returns the totality of ENTREZ ID (gene id) of an OrgDb annotation package. Careful : org.Pf.plasmo.db : no ENTREZID but ORF

violinPlotD()

Builds a violinplot from a numeric matrix

visualizeClusters()

wrapperRunClustering()
